title: Mozilla Firefox 122 Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New
description:
Mozilla Firefox 122 open-source, free, and cross-platform web browser is now available for download with various new features and improvements. Here's what's new!

The post Mozilla Firefox 122 Is Now Available for Download, Here’s What’s New appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Linux Mint 21.3 “EDGE” ISO Released with Linux Kernel 6.5
description:
Linux Mint 21.3 “EDGE” ISO flavor is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.5 for those who need extra hardware support.

The post Linux Mint 21.3 “EDGE” ISO Released with Linux Kernel 6.5 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: MX Linux 23.2 Is Out with Linux Kernel 6.6, PipeWire 1.0, and Debian 12.4 Base
description:
MX Linux 23.2 distribution is now available for download based on Debian GNU/Linux 12.4 "Bookworm" and featuring Linux kernel 6.6 LTS for the AHS (Advanced Hardware Support) edition.

The post MX Linux 23.2 Is Out with Linux Kernel 6.6, PipeWire 1.0, and Debian 12.4 Base appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
